entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Winnipeg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -23.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg Richardson Int'l Airport 9:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -23.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -26.8°C
Wind: WNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
